content: I’m impatient alone with this problem since some years ago when I realized how wrapped we are in this tech-trap. I do see my parents, girlfriend and others frequently locked on their phones looking for idiots entertainments and just wasting their times. Even being from Tech, I intend to find some solution to minimize the time spent on mobiles, in a more productive way. Now I’ve reading and watched a lot about philosophy in order to try to understand the human behavior among the society and I found out some similar points as wrote in this article, like: most people may think technology is just positive, that we must to pay attention to everything posted to ours timelines or that we must to answer everybody in real time they mention us and so on. In actually I’m drafting (still on paper) an App to allow the user to use their actual social networks in a more useful way in order to live their lifes with more purpose without a lot of unnecessary distractions. Thanks for the article and congratulations for the initiative. I’ll keep watching the Time Well Spent. PS.: Sorry about my poor english.
